title: Scratch Programming Basics
content: This is an introduction to Scratch programming. Scratch is a visual programming language aimed at children, which uses drag-and-drop programming blocks.

comments.author: user123
comments.content: This is a great introduction! I'm learning a lot.

comments.author: john_doe
comments.content: I didn't know Scratch had so many features. Thanks for the info!

title: Advanced Scratch Tips
content: This post explores advanced techniques in Scratch, such as using lists, clones, and more complex scripts.

comments.content: These advanced tips are really helpful. I had trouble understanding clones before.

title: Scratch Game Development
content: Learn how to create simple games in Scratch. This guide covers everything from the basic mechanics to advanced game logic.

comments.author: game_dev_guy
comments.content: This guide is a perfect starting point for creating my own Scratch game!
